channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023071163
item.description:
Report X-2023071163

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023071163 SequenceEvent: Fully regulated damaged hazmat package was found in unloading area DescribePack: Upon inspection one of the containers of Micro Kill disinfectant cleaner and deodorizer had a loose cap which had caused an internal leakage inside of the box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Fully regulated damaged hazmat package was placed in a hazmat plastic bag. 2. X-2023071165 SequenceEvent: Fully regulated damage package was found in unloading area DescribePack: Upon inspection one of the containers of micro kill Q3 concentrated disinfectant cleaner and deodorizer had a loose cap which had caused an internal leakage inside of the box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Fully regulated damage package was placed inside of a plastic hazmat bag.

item.title: Report X-2023061348
item.description:
Report X-2023061348

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO LEAKING PACKAGE AT LOAKING BAY. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEETS FOR CLEANING UP SPILL. PACAKGE AND CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN DMN TRAY AND TAKEN TO DMN PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
